hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`d:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "Whoever claims to be the son of a person other than his father, and he knows that person is not his father, then Paradise will be forbidden for him." I mentioned that to Abu Bakra, and he said, "My ears heard that and my heart memorized it from Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ ادَّعَى إِلَى غَيْرِ أَبِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever claims to be the son of a person other than his father
